Reviews.Author: Alessandro
Reviews.Content: This place deserves 10 stars... Not only is the gelato as authentic as gelato in Italy but so is the great company/hospitality

Reviews.Author: Ahdriana
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I come here at least once a week or every other week lately to feed my newfound gelato addiction. The owner is also one of the nicest people I've ever met and so passionate about what she does!   I always sample a few of the flavors when I visit, which change daily (some of the day's flavors can be seen on their Instagram; they post daily), but we usually end up going with an 8 oz of fior di latte and Thai tea-- can't go wrong with these delicious flavors. The sticky toffee pudding is also a favorite of ours.

Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I was one of the dumb ones who never made it to Desyree's old spot Downtown, but I will definitely be making up for that now that Gelatololgy is open in the SW. Desyree was super sweet, offering us samples of her favorites and letting us try whatever else we wanted. I tried the flavor of the day which was raspberry kit kit, as well as pear gorgonzola, rose petal and chai latte. All were very good and of course I couldn't make up my mind. I ended up choosing the second smallest cup size, with half pear gorgonzola and the other half pistachio baklava. Both were very good, but after a while the gorgonzola was a little too cheesy-tasting for me. The pistachio baklava had subtle pistachio flavor but plenty of crunchy, sweet baklava mixed throughout. I really enjoyed both flavors, and I plan to come here often and try as many different flavors as I can.

Reviews.Author: Janelle
Reviews.Content: I kept seeing Gelatology pop up on my friends' social media accounts and knew when I came to Vegas to visit, I needed to visit this gelato shop, Absolutely no regrets. A visit to Gelatology is the perfect way to combat the Vegas heat while also giving you the chance to indulge in the creamy delight of the sweet and savory gelato served here.  What I love the most about Gelatology has to be the superb customer service. The employee who served us was familiar with my friends (who are guilty as charged, regulars) and super patient & willing to let you try as many, if not all, the flavors you wanted before deciding on the scoops you were going to get. This is really important to me because if I'm going to shell out the dolla dolla bills I want to know that I'm getting what I want.  And since you're able to test the waters and try out all the flavors they have to offer without the guilt trip you really can't go wrong with whatever you choose whether it be something sweet, savory, or super fruity!   I also really love that the flavors here are consistently changing. While some flavors are reoccurring, you'll always be sure to find something new next time you come in. Keeps you guessing, keep you surprised, and keeps you on your toes!

Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: 8 min until close and the owner was impressive, not to mention the amazing flavors! Legit.

Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: This place is amazing. I wish I could give it 10 stars instead of 5.  I had heard so much about this place, even when it had a different name and a different location. So when I checked my Yelp bookmarks and saw that this place was really close to where I was having dinner, I forced my out of town guests to have dessert with me here.   When we walked in, we were greeted by Desyree herself. She immediately engaged us in conversation and then started explaining her products. The passion and love that she has for this business and her creations is very apparent.   Anytime I ever go to a place that allows you to have samples, I am a little shy about asking for too many. This was not the case as Desyree pointed out the ones to try and handed us a little sample without us even asking for it. She discussed some of the ingredients in the flavors and it really helped me to choose what flavor I was going to order.  I eventually settled on the apple and rhubarb pie flavor as it reminded me of desserts my mom likes to make. My brother didn't order anything because he was too full from eating half of my bimbibap on top of his own dinner. So I was sure to get him homemade marshmallow  treats for his flight. He got the nutella and the original marshmallows and he reported via text the next day that he loved them.   Such a great vibe, unique flavors, fresh ingredients, amazing service. Love it.

Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I loved this place when they were in downtown under a different name and I love it even more now that it is close to my house!   The decor is modern and a huge upgrade from their first location.   The gelato is amazing. I got the smallest size    and it was the perfect size to not overdo it. I originally didn't think I could finish it because I thought it would be too sweet after awhile but boy was I wrong. I could have licked it clean.   We tried the apple fritter (which tasted exactly like an apple fritter), the fruit loop (which had fruit loops mixed in and was also delicious but a little on the sweet side for me) I also just tasted the vegan chocolate because it looked amazing and it was spot on for chocolate and hard to believe it was vegan.   Gelatology is absolutely a treat and something I will look forward to trying again soon!   Everything here is so delicious!!

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: My family and I stopped in here and omg I'm so glad that we did!! I tried a few flavors, that were amazing. I tried the mango tajin, lemon berry, raspberry sorbet, cookies and creme, a cheesecake, toffee. Everything I tried was delicious even the savory pear and Gorgonzola gelato.   I bought the lemon whoopie pie with blueberry gelato, it was amazing! I have quiet a sweet tooth, the cookie was not overly sweet but I couldn't finish the whole cookie. I would give this place ten stars if I could.   The staff was so so friendly, they let us (a group of 4) try numerous different flavors and never seemed put off by it. I'm pretty sure we tried every flavor they had!   My grandma had told the owner that we were four generations and the owner was so sweet and thankful that we chose her spot she gave us some cookies too!   If I could give more stars I would!

Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Holy Mother of @#$#!  This is hands the best Gelato place I have ever been too.  It's like your taste buds tripping on acid.  From the moment my friends took me to this piece of culinary heaven I knew from he warm greet of the owner we were in for something special.  Right off the bat we saw interesting combos of gelato and sorbeto flavors that the owner Desyree' hadcrafted in her Gelatology lab to perfection, from marscapone latte to pear gorganzola andevery flavor imaginable we were allowed to sample whatever we wanted.  Pure Gelato heaven.  I finally opted for the Coconut Sorbetto which is like a slice of carribean heaven! What a great life experience if you're around Vegas hit this spot for sure! Do NOT MISS THIS Culinary treat.  P.S. Try the bacon candy!!!! Yummmmmmm!

Reviews.Author: Leal
Reviews.Content: 70%- The gelato shop location is in a small south Las Vegas residential mall. The business itself is of average size for an ice cream/gelato shop and the interior is clean. The staff was friendly. The selection of gelato was unsatisfactory. When we visited this business, their second  gelato cooler was inoperative. They had other gelato flavors in the back of the business, but one had to request if additional flavors were available. The quality was average in comparison to other gelato shops across the country. The cookies and/or pastries are overpriced and the cookie quality is  average.  We paid approximately $8 and some change for a small bag of 3 or 4 argentina cookies. The price of the bag of cookies was written upon the counter ,but was not legible. You only knew the price of the cookies after the transaction had been conducted. The key question is.. would I revisit this establishment?  ........Unfortunately, I would likely not return due to the selection of other various gelato shops across Las Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Annemarie
Reviews.Content: Walked in around 8...had the Elvis ...it was amazing!   I would have preferred a little more fruity sauce but honest to god the gelato I tarot for like SILK!!!!  And the bacon was the most perfectly cooked bacon in my life!!!!

Reviews.Author: Kearby
Reviews.Content: Really nice people working here. Large portions of yummy gelato. Plenty of flavor choices for my family to each try something different. Will definitely be back!

Reviews.Author: Karuna
Reviews.Content: The reviews of Gelatology definitely live up to the hype. I absolutely love coming here for a post lunch treat! Not only is the service amazing, but the gelato is SO flavorful and delicious. You are always welcomed with a hello and a smile and flooded with samples to try any and every flavor that they have. There is always a new, unusual flavor but ends up tasting amazing! My latest favorite is the lemon poppyseed! Definitely pay a visit here!

Reviews.Author: Rhonalyn
Reviews.Content: Gelatology is my favorite gelato place. I was beyond satisfied when dez (the owner), was able to make a customized cake that I needed for a birthday party. Simple, beautiful and absolutely delicious.

Reviews.Author: Ilian
Reviews.Content: I tried their chocolate whoopie-ology. I asked for cookies and creme but they gave me the wrong one. And the wrong one they gave me had a very dry cake, so dry that it crumbled when I took a bite. This is the only time I've had a not-so-great experience. Luckily we purchased a second whoopie (red velvet), and this one had a moist cake and was very delicious. It was this that made me come back. All the other whoopies I have purchased have been moist and delicious. I would recommend this place to anyone with a sweet tooth.

Reviews.Author: Kareena
Reviews.Content: This is place is really unique, from decorations to the flavors of the gelato, Gelatology is really different.  My visit started with a guy greeting us warmly with free samples. There were so many odd combinations, but they were all so good! Flavors include: figs & goat cheese, cheese & crackers, sweet potato cheesecake, avocado with chocolate chips, and the list goes on!   What I really like about this place is the vegan options; there was a wide variety to chose from. I ended up getting a half and half cup with one side avocado with chocolate chips and lavender macaroon--BOTH VEGAN and BOTH DELICIOUS.   The price is fairly reasonable too. I got a 6 oz portion and it ended up being about $6, and the scoops were very generous.   Be sure to sample all the flavors before choosing so you know what you're getting yourself into. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Reviews.Author: Obsidian Blackbird
Reviews.Content: I came in really full already so I didn't try a lot of flavors. What I tried were good. Glad it's here next to tanning place. There's really no other ice cream or frozen yogurt in this neighborhood.

Reviews.Author: Jhunelyn
Reviews.Content: I loved Art of Flavors when Desyree was there, but thank god she's on her own now with Gelatology. The best thing is that it's less than 10 minutes from home now.  This place never fails to make my day! This is why I always take everyone here.   Desyree still makes the best gelato as sorbetto! I can literally go here everyday without getting tired of their gelato. My favorites so far include the sweet corn, cinnamon toast crunch, rose petals, rice pudding, ugh I can't possible list them all.   The service is still 5 stars! I can't wait to see what else Desyree has in stock for us.

Reviews.Author: Edison
Reviews.Content: All the goodness of  Art of Flavors  is back, better than ever. Don't worry, you can still sample everything and still have a hard time making up your mind.  :) The new location is great for locals, plenty of parking and easy to find within the shopping center.

Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: Never really thought about getting Gelato before until I saw this place on yelp with all the reviews.   First off,  customer service.  One lady was helping out the people who walked in before us and another one was busy doing something but dropped it and greeted my friends and I right away.  Off to a good start.   We let her know it was our first time there and she told us about how the Gelato is all freshly made and to sample all of them.  So we sampled a few and they were intriguing.    Creamy and smooth, I liked a couple and some were not for me.  Ended up getting the warm peach cobbler and the pear with ricotta cheese. I was full before heading here BTW and the pear with ricotta cheese was pretty good. Felt like I fell and a cloud caught me.  When I feel that type of way about food,  it's a 5 star.  Lol. I'll be back.

Reviews.Author: Teera
Reviews.Content: Need I say more?? 5 stars place that you must try!   What I truly learned about beside having my amazing gelato ....Passion, customer service and skills are definitely you can't find in many places out there these day and I found all that here.   I'm so happy I found this place! Keep making us yummy sweet please.

Reviews.Author: N
Reviews.Content: It was my first time coming here! The lady chef explained that how they make this gelato all from scratch everyday! They got very unique flavors and they also have gluten free! I m so glad I found this place!

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Items Selected: Gelatology Samples - Pistachio, Lemon Meringue Pie, Gingerbread Toffee with Licorice, Cinnamon Tres Leches with Honey Comb, Strawberry Red Velvet with Chocolate Cake, Maria Cookie with Peppermint and Whoppers, Thai Tea with Biscoff, Berry Smoothie with Tajin Small Cinnamon Tres Leches with Honey Comb, Strawberry Red Velvet with Chocolate Cake Small Gingerbread Toffee with Licorice, Maria Cookie with Peppermint and Whoppers Nutella Panettone  Still not having tasted a winning submission to Gelatology's  Suggest a Flavor  contest earlier this year, though a portion of the idea was thoroughly enjoyed a week prior in the form of Desyree's Honeycomb Brittle, it was with a promise that the owner herself would be in Saturday afternoon that a stop was made, a whole bunch of new Gelato flavors to taste with innovation that continues to amaze.  Making way to South Rainbow Boulevard after lunch, full but focused on the idea that Ice Cream only fills in the cracks, it was a cheerful Mrs. Alberganti who greeted patrons at the door, sample after sample presented as the holidays were discussed, and a smile always present on one of the Las Vegas food industry's most universally beloved faces.  Intrigued by stories of her inspiration, the light Licorice infused Gingerbread Toffee so awash in spicy aromatics that it makes both seasonal Frosted Houses and Cookie Men pale in comparison, even better bites were found in the Maria Cookie with Peppermint and Whoppers based on a confection found in Southern California while the Cinnamon Tres Leches with Honey Comb came not from my brain, but from a Cake that still stands out as my favorite dessert of the 2016 from Super Chunk in Scottsdale.  Enjoying the mellow fruit notes of  Red Velvet with Chocolate Cake,  the typical artificial colors replaced by fresh Strawberries while Lemon Meringue Pie came complete with buttery crust and airy Egg-White pockets, it was after more talk and well-wishes for the Holidays that way was made to the street, a wispy Panettone with a hefty core of pure Nutella taken home for later indulgence.  FIVE STARS:  It can be counted on one hand how often this blog has two entries for the same place in back-to-back weeks - yet even in a city with plenty of choices, why accept anything less than the best?

Reviews.Author: Jewelyn
Reviews.Content: Came here the other night for a night cap of sweetness.  Even if it's cold in Las Vegas... gelato is great anytime!  Love that their social media post flavors of the day. Different flavors daily make this place a popular spot.  I had their green tea gelato with white chocolate in the mix.  I'll be back for more! :)

Reviews.Author: Lucila
Reviews.Content: Staff was very welcoming and offered tastes of as many flavors as you wanted to help you decide on one. The gelato is of very good quality and the flavor offerings range from your typical chocolate to a more adventurous and imaginative selection. Bonus point: they have home made sweets that you can take home and enjoy later!

Reviews.Author: Larissa
Reviews.Content: I've been here three times in the last three weeks and have not been disappointed. My favorite flavor is pistachio baklava. Other good ones passion fruit and green tea kit Kat. Honestly everything I've tried has been awesome. They make all their gelato from scratch - no mixes and you can tell. Best gelato I've had outside of Rome! Check their instagram for flavors of the day, it constantly changes.

Reviews.Author: Jesena
Reviews.Content: Loved this place! The guy behind the counter was super helpful and suggested lot's of items to try out. We decided to try out the Rocher ice cream, WOW! It was nutty, chocolaty and just simply awesome. They seem to rotate their flavors a lot, which on one hand is great, but the yummy flavors they posted on Facebook seemed to be gone already. Such a bummer that we live so far away and most likely won't be back for another year or two. I would otherwise be there on a weekly basis.

Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: Love this place. Takes me like 30 minutes to pick a flavor out because everything is so good lol. If you follow their ig she posts her flavors of the day and it's always a surprise. Because of this reason I wish they had a set menu for certain days. I get sad when she posts a flavor I've been wanting to try and I'm not in the area haha.

Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I was so sad when Art of Flavors closed down downtown.  Luckily for me, Desyree decided to open up her new spot on my side of town!  Now I can get my pear and Gorgonzola gelato whenever I please.  The way she makes gelato is absolutely amazing.  Another one of my favorites is the Green Tea Kit Kat.    Check out her instagram gelatologylv to see what she flavors she has for the day!

Reviews.Author: Ricalynn
Reviews.Content: LOVE this place!!!!! Service is amazing, staff is very warm and welcoming, and the flavors are so creative and well done!!!! (Will definitely be adding more to this review soon!)

Reviews.Author: Soo
Reviews.Content: Finally got to try this place out. I got there a little late, and they were about to close the store, but they still led me in and served me very friendly. Their price is really cheap for the quality of gelatos they offer. I usually get my gelato from Amorino, so if I were to compare the two places, I would pick Amorino, but that is just because amorino has more fruity choices than Gelatology. However, Gelatology's menu was impressive and creative. I got their raspberry and green tea flavors. The green tea one was very light but it had something like bread crumbs in it so it made it extra flavorful and fluffy. Also, their raspberry was a little sour but fruity to the max too. I took them home and had to have my whole family have a bite because it was so good, i wanted to have them try as well.   The staff told me that they get different flavors everyday, which I would give them a lot of credit for working on it. It is so close to my house that I would actually stop by whenever i have sweet tooth.

Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: First time here best gelato in Vegas. The staff was very friendly and the decor was inviting !

Reviews.Author: Lawrence
Reviews.Content: Not sure I'll add much to the 5 star reviews - look up Art of Flavors and see the glowing reviews.  There are people who literally went daily.  Now that this is 5-10 minutes from where I live, I'll be coming here much more often.    Everything here is the goods!  Come here - come here often!

Reviews.Author: Lonie
Reviews.Content: Brand new place with endless varieties of gelato flavors! I love how they have flavors that other places do not have. I am so glad this is by our house now and we will definitely be regulars!

Reviews.Author: Janelle
Reviews.Content: These Italians are no joke. Desyree's gelato is delicious, and they put out different flavors everyday! We were served by a fast talking and hilarious man and couldn't help but buy more than we came for. It was a great experience, and we are more than satisfied with our purchases. Will be back for sure!!!

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that Chef Desyree has been able to reopen and feed me gluttonous treats. My boyfriend and I have always been such suckers for her crazy creative flavors and her professionalism. We trust her with every flavor we've had and that includes the blue cheese. Coming from someone that does not eat blue cheese, not even on salads, that's saying something!  Desyree is such a delight to work with and I enjoy seeing her whenever we go in. I know that she works hard and puts her all into her work. She knows how to mix the perfect combination of flavors to reach gelato nirvana. Her baked desserts like her cookie butter salted biscuits and cookies are equally mouth-watering. If I had the metabolism of my other half, I would personally be buying her gelato by the tub (which you can do).  Of all of the dessert choices in Las Vegas, Gelatology with Chef Desyree is my favorite.

Reviews.Author: Apryl
Reviews.Content: Amazing gelato and the owners are wonderful. I drive 30 minutes just for this gelato and I do it gladly. We took my Father In Law who had just gotten back from Italy and he said it was perfect. I will always recommend Gelatology to my friends.

Reviews.Author: TennisBum
Reviews.Content: I love Gelatology.  It's now the benchmark for all ice cream and gelato I eat in the world.  For example. I was in Phoenix.  I tried a place there that's doing interesting flavors, including breakfast cereals.  I had Cinnamon Toast Crunch at this PHoenix place.  I could barely tell it was that.  The flavors did not  pop .  Then I get to Gelatology, guess what they've got?  Cinnamon Toast Crunch.  Perfection.  As soon as the gelato hits your tongue, you know what you're eating.  I go it along with the brilliant pairing of Oreo and matcha (green tea).  This time, they upped the amount of the matcha since my last eating of this flavor.  It works so well.  Layers of tastes that don't fit each other, but augment.

Reviews.Author: Kimberlee
Reviews.Content: Best Gelato in town it literally melts in your mouth and flavors are always changing but I have never been disappointed!

Reviews.Author: Marjie G.
Reviews.Content: Our friend and neighbor took us to Gelatology for a class in Sweet vs. Savory 101. A nice shop full of sweets beckoning even the most diehard dieter. Macaroons looked fresh and colorful.   Here are some flavors I sampled. All were delicious.  Salt and caramel Birthday cake Dulce de leche Pear and Gorgonzola Chocolate and Coconut  I had the chocolate and coconut and was satisfied.  I'm not so adventerous but on my next visit I will try more savory flavors  .

Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Omg never had gelato this good before.  Simply amazing!  Made fresh by the owner Desiree - an award winning gelato chef - number two in the country!   Super friendly, extremely good gelatos.  Tell them it's your first time and they will take you on a tasting tour of their gelatos.   A WOW experience.  Come. Enjoy!

Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: So happy to have found this place again! I was heartbroken she. Art Of Flavor closed, but so excited to learn that my favorite gelato spot has reopened!

Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: She's back and brought all of her lovely flavors of Gelato with her.   Fresh and flavorful tasting gelato that always satisfying.  I don't have a favorite as there are too many I like.

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Hands down the best gelato OF MY LIFE!  I went here with both of my kids, and the owner was so sweet about letting them try different flavors! It was super appreciated by this busy mom.   I went for the snickers and green tea kit kat, my kids had the cookies and cream. I can't think of one thing wrong. It was all good. The kids persuaded me to buy some macaroons too. I regret nothing.  Take my $$$$!

Reviews.Author: Alyssa
Reviews.Content: My favorite gelato place ever. My boyfriend and I used to love the old place, Art of Flavors and we were in a state of depression when the owners changed. We just recently went to Gelatology and the owner remembered us from the time we went to Art of Flavors. It made us feel extremely welcomed. Can't wait to go there again!

Reviews.Author: Rochelle
Reviews.Content: The best in town! In the past 2 weeks I've gone 5 times because they keep bringing out new flavors everyday! It's hard to catch up haha

Reviews.Author: MayMay
Reviews.Content: This is one of my FAVORITE places in Vegas, period! It's my Cheers. Desyreé Alberganti is a phenom when it comes to gelato. She and her team create the most inventive and inspired flavors at this dessert spot. Customers are made to feel welcome and taken care of. It's amazing how encouraging they are to get eaters out of their comfort zone by just offering up free tastes. I've had flavors that included Roasted Red Bell Pepper, Fois Gras, Chili Popcorn, Gorgonzola, and many more that I would have never even thought of in dessert period, let alone in gelato. It's such a treat to have this place in our valley.   I think prices are very reasonable considering the high quality of the product. I'm sure the price point is such so that visitors like me really can try out different combinations that maybe we normally wouldn't. Gelatology also has long hours ideal for a post-dinner meetup.   Do yourself a favor, or a FLAVOR (ha! bad pun, I know) and visit as soon as possible!

Reviews.Author: Ivonne
Reviews.Content: Perfect!! Delicious like always.. Super happy it's nearby our house. Desyree is always so welcoming and happy to see her customers.

Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: We weren't sure Desyree would remember us but she did!  She came out from behind the glass hugged us both and even remembered my husband can't have dairy!    Her flavors were amazing as usual! We're so happy she's back!

Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: So many fun flavors!! Unfortunately we arrived late and they were out of a lot of flavors. However, the service is more than outstanding. In case you didn't know, if you follow them on Instagram they post their daily flavors and if you really crave it, you can call ahead and they'll stash some away for you! So awesome!!

Reviews.Author: Marlon
Reviews.Content: With so many amazing reviews, I'm going to keep this short and Sweet. By far the best Gelato Shop in Vegas. Creative and delicious flavors! Don't forget to strike a conversation with Desyree, the owner of Gelatology. A local resident for over 20 years who is very friendly and makes you feel like your family.

Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: If heaven was a place on earth this is it!!! Not only is the entire staff friends and wants to give you samples and just talk, the gelato is seriously the most amazing this you will ever try in your life!! We stumbled upon on this a couple months ago when we moved near rainbow and now we are in at least once-twice a week!!!

Reviews.Author: Julianne
Reviews.Content: Desyree is the sweetest lady! We've been here a couple of times, and each time we got a few samples. The service is fabulous, and the flavors change all the time. The quality of each item has been so creamy and tasty. They even have a rewards system (1 point for every $10 spent, a free pint after 9 points). Totally worth checking out! Trust me... you won't go just once. Definitely try the pear and gorgonzola gelato.

Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: Every flavor I've sampled has been delicious. Glad to have this place so close. They have savory flavors but I enjoy the more traditional flavors the best.

Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Owner was very detailed and knowledgeable with his flavors. Green tea kit kat and raspberry sorbet were really good. The smell of waffle cones is extremely pleasing as you walk in. The flavors are rich and interesting. Will be here more often!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: ** updated review**  I've been back to gelatology many times since my previous reviews and everyone that I've taken there has fallen in love with it. I now know that I should check out their IG gelatologylv before heading over. I absolutely love their ube kit Kat, Nutella rocky road, PANDAN kit Kat and Thai tea.   The owner is super generous with her portions and actually mixes the toppings with the gelato before scooping whereas her workers just scoop away and I sometimes end up with none of the yummy topping garnishes she puts on her gelato.   Get the cone, you won't regret it. You can put two flavors in a cone :) I'm really glad I gave gelatology another chance. Some flavors are ehhh but some are out of this world amazing! Oh, and service is ALWAYS great no matter how busy they are.   Old review:  Gelatology is a far drive from where I live. I read reviews about how art of flavors used to be owned by the owner who opened this shop so wanted to try it.  Service was great, we basically tried almost every single flavor. Soursop sorbeto had a VERY subtle soursop taste which was disappointing. I felt like a lot of the flavors had such light subtle flavors that were just so so. My favorite was the wildberry & lavender and green tea kit Kat. The green tea flavor isn't very strong though. I didn't try the coffee and rocky road thinking they'd be like every other place... And thinking that they were safe choices, I chose those two. Coffee was VERY watered down, I've never had a bad experience with any coffee flavored gelato or ice cream... Until now. The rocky road wasn't the usually chocolate, I made a mistake and thought it was! Turns out it was made with bananas. It wasn't bad though.  My friend got a large container ($8.50?) of tobacco to go. That flavor was actually pretty good! I'm not sure what's in it though... She also got the lemon pound cake and the wildberry&lavender to enjoy in the store. I tried the lemons pound cake and it was like chunks of pound cake & gelato with very subtle hints of lemon. It was good!   I was disappointed with my flavors but my friend enjoyed hers. The flavors are changed daily so maybe the next time I come back I'll find something that I'll like.

Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: ***Yelp Challenge 2016 16/100***  Des is the BOMBDOTCOM! I love her as a person! She is genuinely nice and real! I love when people keep it real. She is the owner of this wonderful place that sell the best gelato in Las Vegas. I am so happy that there is a good dessert spot in the Southwest side of Las Vegas.   She has many unique flavors and always switches things up. If you havent been there, try all of the flavors. You can go from sweet to something a little less sweet. The gelato is never ever super sweet. As far as the flavors she is going to have for the day, I usually go to her account on Instagram and if I see what I like I am there!  If you haven't tried her hot chocolate, its a must. She uses the marshmallows that she makes and she also makes her own chocolate. Wont go into more details because you just have to go there and try it. You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Author: Lymophine
Reviews.Content: I'm not a big fan of artificial coloring on food after I start learning how to make strawberry mousse myself with real strawberry, after blending tons of strawberry and pour it into my mousse, the color comes out barely pink, almost pinkish white.  When I visit gelatology for the first time, their strawberry gelato caught my eye because the color looks EXACTLY like my strawberry mousse, not like the bloody red color from other icecream store you would normally see.  Owner said she doesn't put dye in it, THANK YOU! this is exactly what I'm looking for! I love the strawberry of course, second time I went there I completely fell in love with her avocado gelato! I can't wait to try others next time I go!  Owner is super nice and sweet by the way, you can tell she's really proud of her gelato !!!!

Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: We've had gelato around the country and the world (including Italy). This place, in a Vegas strip mall, is among the best. The flavors are highly unusual, intense, and well-balanced. The owner offered (without us even asking) numerous samples, as well as suggestions for good combinations. We had: green tea Oreo, strawberry cream, pear Gorgonzola, and sapphire grape sorbetto. If you want gelato, and can get away from the Strip, then this place is the answer.

Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Halo halo gelato?! Yaaassss! My favorite flavor is the sweet cream one (I think that's what it's called). Everything else I've sampled has been pretty good. Service is great, however, one night the guy started scooping and getting other people's orders when ours wasn't complete yet. Then he almost rang them up before us.

Reviews.Author: Judit
Reviews.Content: I was reading about Gelatology on Yelp, and wanted to try their gelato about one month now.  Finally this afternoon I decided to find this store. It wasn't hard, since I already checked the map, and immediately realized, it's conveniently located in the Smith's shopping center, where I am shopping for groceries a lot! After walking to the shop, I recognized everything what I already knew from other yelp reviews. I really can't add more to my review than others already did! I been offered to try different flavored gelato! After tasting five, all good ones, I choose chocolate and coconut!  (6oz for $5.50)  It was delicious! I learned that the lady behind the counter is the owner. She was very polite and informative! She told me that the products are made without any chemicals or food dye!  Also some gelato made for lactose intolerant people! Very impressed! Can't wait to return with my friend, and try other items too! I already drove by this evening with my daughter, to show her this new place!

Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: To exclaim that I love this establishment is an understatement. This is the second time that I've visited and it's definitely going to be a frequent stop whenever I come into town. I took my boyfriend to get a cool treat for his birthday and was amazed at the selection of flavors. I ordered blueberry cheesecake and German chocolate cake on a waffle cone and I was blown away. My boyfriend ordered a cookies and cream whoopie pie which was also out of this world.  I really liked that when my boyfriend was trying to select which whoopie pie to order, someone described each flavor option to him. I believe it was the owner who did, and it was wonderful to see how much the staff care so much about their product.   The prices were also very fair. We paid $13.00 for both and without looking at the prices on the menu would've thought that our total could've been at least $16.00 because of the quality of their products and because it's all made in house.   I highly recommend this place. I also highly suggest that you look up their Instagram prior to entering to get an idea as to what flavors are available. It's kind of a small establishment so depending on the time of day you enter you may or may not have seating available. None-the-less, a great spot to cool off from this summer heat!

Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Best gelato in town.  They also give every guest 100% of their attention to make them feel special.

Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I visited this place down at the SW area. Love the variety of ice cream flavors. I always tried their affogato and it was the bomb! Last time I visited I had their affogato with caramel ice cream. I just love their mixture of their coffee and ice cream. My boyfriend had their hot cocoa and it was good too! The people working here were very welcoming! I will be visiting here again!

Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Came here for dessert with my friend after having a birthday dinner. This is one of her favorite dessert places. It's not that big of a place, but there are some seats inside for dining in, and you can ask for cups of water.   Gelatology has a ton of fresh flavors and only four in the back left corner (facing the glass display case) are fixed flavors; the other ones change regularly. Service is attentive and friendly, and you can sample as many flavors as you want. You can also get at least two flavors even with the smallest size gelato.  Prices were fair and portions reasonable for the price. I liked my gelato but it was a bit creamier and more ice-cream like than I anticipated. My favorite gelato of all time still remains Naia in NorCal, but Gelatology is quite good too.

Reviews.Author: Lynndee
Reviews.Content: Gelatology is such a lovely place to end your night with dessert. The owners create so many amazing concoctions that you'll be wondering what they'll come up with next. I don't indulge too often--or else I'd come here every night, but when I have the flavors were always fresh and tasty up to the last minute of the day! You will be happy and surprised by the selection. And you will always taste the wonderful quality of every bite you take.

Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I'm not a sweets kinda guy but...holy amazing! I tested out every flavor because the owner just handed them to me. I admire her business skills, but I am even more blown away by her serious talent to combine flavors to perfection. She told me she has been open for only three month and I couldn't believe that she already had 110 reviews and 5 stars on Yelp. Bravo! Keep up the good work, truly a Vegas GEM!!!!

Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: The variety and quality of geletology is awesome, if getting somthing light after dinner or just craving something sweet give this place a shot. They have gluten free options along with some vegan options so there is somthing for everyone. They change the flavors that they have daily so check the shops instagram for what they have in. The service is great and they are more then happy to let you sample as much as you want which is great because they have alot of unique flavors I have never seen. If you get the chance  get green tea kit Kat it rocks!

Reviews.Author: Ivy
Reviews.Content: Really friendly & cozy atmosphere. Good gelato selection! My BF & I loved the gelato we ordered.

Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: A fantastic addition to the neighborhood! We tried Gelatology for the first time last weekend and loved it! Looks like a family owned business (which is awesome). We were greeted as soon as we walked in and offered samples. The owner said everything is made in-house and it shows. The strawberry tasted like the fruit and not the flavoring. The chocolate was creamy but not overly sweet. Compared to other gelato shops at Town Square and Downtown Summerlin, the prices here were much more reasonable. We'll definitely be adding this place to our dessert rotation!

Reviews.Author: Dillon
Reviews.Content: I don't think you know how happy I am I found this place... It is so damn good and the employees make it even better. Such a chill vibe.. Had to take a pint of all the vegan options.. Wanted to stay here for hours..

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: The store has a great selection of gelato, whoopie pies, macaroons, and other sweets. The owner is super helpful and let's you try their daily specials. The flavors are really unique and definitely worth trying out.

Reviews.Author: Asad
Reviews.Content: They offer amazing Gelato and different types of flavors on daily basis. The owners are really cool and very friendly. Definitely the best Gelato I've ever tasted.

Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I have to start by saying this is THE BEST gelato!! They always have new flavors to try out and the most unique flavors!!! My favorite flavors so far are green tea kit kat, ube and pistachio. Yum! I always like getting mine in a cone just to be little extra haha. I look forward to my gelato every time i go!

Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Different flavors made inhouse everyday. Can't find flavors like these anywhere else.... Soooo good

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: This place is basically the definition of what you want from a local establishment.   First, the product (in this case gelato and pastries) is both excellent and unique. Fried chicken and waffles gelato? Does that even make any sense? Who cares, it's awesome. There is a constant rotation of weird and classic flavors. You can tell the owners love what they do.   Second, the service is always super friendly and engaging. We're happy to go just to interact. We probably stop in every month or so and they always remember my kids. They're just great.   This place is a real gem. If you're looking for a case study on how to run a business, just watch this place. I can't say enough.

Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: Delicious! Husband got the cookie butter gelato and I got the passion fruit lavender. The lady that rung us out I believe is the owner, she was so sweet and awesome and let us try everything.

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Delicious!! and the owner was so courteous to offer us samples of almost everything! This place exhibits how to open a new spot in LV. Unique, quality and great service all around!!

Reviews.Author: Kawin
Reviews.Content: Read about this place on yelp and we decided to drive 25 minutes from Henderson to give it a try.  We were slightly disappointed.  The flavor selections to choose from were quite limited.  We tried a scoop of the pear and gorgonzola and lychee with marshmellows.  Both were rich, dense, and smooth but overly sweet  that we couldn't finish.    It wasn't bad but the overall 5-star review on Yelp led us to expect more.

Reviews.Author: Han
Reviews.Content: 5 stars with 140 something reviews? No way..... but yes way Jose. This place finally brought something Vegas needed which was artisan gelato.  Menu: They feature several of the not so typical ice cream parlor offerings. I sampled the rosemary honey caramel, green tea oreo, passion fruit, and halo halo. Already it's just a surprise of what they can create here.   Gelato: Fresh, creamy and more importantly for me: not so rich. I chose the green tea oreo and really enjoyed it. I'm not big into ice cream but this really made me appreciate ice cream much more than I did. I chose the small kids cup at $4   Service: Family owned and honest to God service. One particular thing I noticed and applaud this establishment for is how they jam pack the ice cream into the cup. Most places just get a scoop and place it but the owner stuffed the cup with gelato. Much appreciated sir! It was kinda cute seeing the older grand parents in the back helping out and his young daughter coming in to greet her dad (owner).   Overall: Yes yes yes, these people understand the science of gelato with ph.d. in hand. Wonderful!

Reviews.Author: Meshel
Reviews.Content: LOVE the wide variety of flavors. I thought it was very cool they cater to gluten free, and vegan. I got cafe latte, and the flavor was just right! We are visitors to Las Vegas, but we will be back next time we are in town.

Reviews.Author: Clint
Reviews.Content: There are so many great flavors here, it's hard to call them all out. But the spicy chocolate with peperoncino has been one of my favorites with its mild spiciness that lingers on the palate. You can't really go wrong with any of the flavors. I'm always on the lookout for the Instagram posts to see what the latest daily specials will be. No other gelato shop in town comes up with their level of creative sweet or savory flavors. There's always something unique for those looking for different flavors. For the less adventurous, there are plenty of traditional flavors to be enjoyed.

Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: The gelato is delicious! The employees are soooo nice they let you try every and anything! Actually encourage it too. Interesting flavors and such a big selection! Yum!

Reviews.Author: Still Water Runs Deep
Reviews.Content: Why 4 stars?  Because the flavors are so unique. You have to come here to see for yourself.   Flavors change daily, so that's really good to know.   I got Alvacado for my first scoop and Pumpkin something for my second scoop....so delicious.  Wife got Cafe Latte for her first scoop and Original cream based something for her second scoop....so delicous.  Just come here when you are in Vegas, it's worth the trip out here.  The owner of this place is awesome and appreciates any feedback you can provide her.   Highly Recommended!!!

Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: Found this gem from others' reviews on Yelp, so I had to pay it forward and help others find the best gelato in Vegas!  I got the biggest one (16 oz I believe) with 3 different flavors.   Green tea Oreo- sounded weird so I had to try it and it was soooo good!!  Peanut butter cookies & cream- What more could you ask for?   Strawberry, peanut butter & banana pancake- This was amazing. Every single bite of it. Hard to pick a favorite when they were all incredible but I'd say this might be it..  Service was great, the man working behind the counter was very friendly! They also had pastries and what appeared to be an awesome coffee program. I'm definitely going to go back and try more flavors!

Reviews.Author: Justine
Reviews.Content: This spot definitely lived up to all the reviews! I went with my future mother and law for a nighttime sweet treat. We were instantly greeted by Anthony and although he was assisting other customers, he gave us a sample to try right away. I had the Pear & Gorgonzola and pistachio. My mother in law had mixed berry and green tea kit-kat! Needless to say we both gobbled ours up within minutes! The store started to get busy as we were leaving but we got a to-go mix of wild berry and cookies & cream for my hubby to be- also amazing flavor! Will definitely be back and thanks for the hospitality and flavor tries Anthony! You're awesome!

Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this place and love that the owner makes new flavors every few days!   I made an Instagram just so i can follow and know what flavors are available which is so smart. Everything I've tried was amazing, and cant wait for new flavors.   My current favorites are the halvah and the tiramisu. Great prices for the quality. I will always come here for gelato!   Her baked goods look amazing as well and will have to try them and will post about them when i do!

Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: Don't usually get gelato, but it's def the spot I hit after kbbq at DOH right next door! So far I've tried their rocky road and ube, both are delicious!

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Desy is back and better then ever. I am super happy she is within a mile of home now! Her mix of flavors is as inventive as ever the latest flavor I'm in love with is Gingerbread Orange Cranberry. As a gingerbread lover there was a nice spice(not heat) with a balancing sweet and bitter more from the fruit. The fruit flavors are always spot on and not overly sweet. My 6 year old actually chose her vegan cookies and cream, made with rice milk, over the usual lactose version(which my son chooses EVERY time).  Gelatology brought a lot more baked goods with its opening. My favorite being the salted Nutella short bread cookies. My kids LOVE the peppermint bark and the delicious, fluffy, flavorful marshmallows.  I've enjoyed a few coffee drinks here and have enjoyed them all! Her house made REAL FRUIT AND HERB syrup sodas are PHENOMENAL, I've tried every flavor she offers. The mint and line one is super refreshing but the passion fruit rosemary is a little sweeter.  All in all I'm happy for the return and addition of Desy to our great south west neighborhood!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I finally get it.  I've been wanting to try Desyree's creations since Art of Flavors, but never had the opportunity to make it down there.  Gelatology is SO close to my house, I made it a point yesterday to let my fiance know that I wanted to try it ASAP...so after dinner, we stopped in.  First of all, the location is small, bright, and very clean.    I'll be honest, I didn't get a look at the full menu, I was too distracted by the gelato!  She has a smallish, but AMAZING selection of flavors, and was more than willing to let us sample whatever we wanted.  Flavors like dark cherry, creme brulee, salted caramel, lemon meringue pie, and the incredible pear and gorganzola cheese gelato.    They were all amazing.  I ended up getting the 6 oz creme brulee, and only ate half of it.  She really packs a lot of gelato into that little cup!!!    She has her savory flavors on Fridays and Saturdays, so I have EVERY intention of stopping by either tonight or tomorrow for a little taste!  Excellent service, excellent product, fantastic location.    I can't wait to go back!!

Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: This place is fabulous. The owner is super nice and he is very aware that a lot of customers have dietary restrictions or allergies. It was the second question he asked us when we came in. He let us sample as many flavors as we wished and had such a variety of flavors. There are also a number of vegan and dairy free options.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: First-time review with the expectation of having the green tea kit kat gelato, except I didnt (insert my sad face). I had the lemon cake and the boyfriend had the mocha flavor. Mind you, I was a bit upset I didn't call ahead prior to visiting just to make sure they had the green tea kit kat (love the actual green tea kit kat!) - that's more of my fault. Regardless, this is still the best gelato I have ever had! I did feel a bit rushed when trying to figure out what I want and sampling, but the guy behind the counter still helped me out.  I will be back for you green tea kit kat gelato!!!

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Where do I begin? To tell the story of how great a love can be. Or not. Emotionally, I'm torn. This is like rekindling with an old flame and realizing that  it wasn't as good as you remembered. Since then you've probably experienced better, met someone new, and fell in love. In my case, it is all of the above. After the tragic break up 6 months ago, I was lost and my heart ached for amazing gelato. Fortunately,  perfect timing  was on my side and that void was filled. Somehow, I fell into the arms of a yummy Aussie...  While I love the kit kat creations, the passion fruit kit kat gelato was good, but lacked in the wafer-y goodness. Only some spoonfuls were loaded with flavor and most others were a bit blah. Next visit, I try the creme brulee and same thing happens. I feel that the mixing could be better.   There are other sweet goodies in the shop like cookies, macarons, macaroons, a creation called  Fat Elvis  and more!   Welcome back Chef Desyree! Your shop is lovely :) I'll stay tuned on your Instagram: gelatologylv for upcoming flavors. Hopefully, one of my favorites will come back.

Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Gelato is so good! And flavors are different every time! Way west Las Vegas but worth the trip! Creme Brelee, Snickers, Banana Froster on point!

Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Oh my goodness!   This place was fantastic!    My daughter and I walked in at 9 PM on a Friday night, store had a nice crowd but we were welcomed immediately by the gentleman working behind the counter.      There were about 15 fresh flavors.. many of which I had no interest of trying.. the gentleman encouraged me to try a variety of mixtures.. and OH MY GOODNESS.. they were all fantastic.  Service exceptional, choices and flavor exceptional and price.. very very fair.

Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: How lucky am I to have been visiting Vegas the same week Chef Desyree opens Gelatology?  Who needs slot machines?  I hit the jackpot, you guys! ;)  First impressions - location is great!  It's sharing a center with a grocery store and a couple of restaurants, so parking is a breeze.  Everything looks upgraded from the signage to the chef's coat.  The interior looks so vibrant and fresh!  Anyway, that's enough about the building/decor, let's talk about some delicious gelato!  The same amazing gelato in a different shell.  We tasted several different flavors: Rosemary Creme Brulee, Lemon Pound Cake (omg), Cookies and Cream, Pistachio, Bread Pudding, and Green Tea Kit Kat.  Every gelato is a perfect embodiment of the flavor it's inspired from.  It's literally like eating a better version of what it's based on.  Now onto Queen Desy!  I wish I could just steal her and bring her to Los Angeles--but I'll just keep dreaming.  It's so refreshing to meet someone who's so passionate about their craft, and it shows in each and every bite.  Truly one of the sweetest people I have ever met.  It's always a pleasure visiting and having a chat with her. :)  I can't wait to visit Vegas again to delve deeper into the menu.  We were just so blindsided by her return that we only focused on the gelato.  We'll see you soon, Desy!

Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Gelatology is a low-key ice cream shop that offers a delicious selection of gelato. Everything from the texture to the flavors are on point. Gelatology offers both fruity and sweeter flavors. What's great is that their flavors are super fun and unique. The texture is smooth, rich and creamy. Additionally, what I really appreciate is how the workers are friendly and have no problem letting you try multiple samples.   While their flavors are always rotating, here are some flavors I tried & highly recommend:  1. Matcha & Oreo - this flavor combines two of my favorite things  2. Tiramisu - light and sweet 3. Strawberry Shortcake - i'm not normally a fan of strawberry ice cream, but this one is an exception  4. Turon - features tropical flavors like jackfruit that results in a perfect balance of fruity and sweet. A perfect summer flavor!   Honestly, you can't go wrong here. The next time I'm in Vegas, I'll definitely be coming back!

Reviews.Author: Pauline
Reviews.Content: 4 stars solely for the man behind the counter. He's so funny and seems to be very customer service orientated, giving us so many samples that it kind of got overwhelming. Most places seem kind of stingy with the samples but he loaded us up with them! It was late and he was still cheerful and cracking jokes. Gelato was okay, but I would definitely go back to be entertained by him.

Reviews.Author: Krystal
Reviews.Content: It's my first time in this place.  My friend recommended to me because of I love ice cream so much.  I got S'mores cake, tiramisu and the one that is mix with cheese...  Pear& gorgonzola cheese! Love it!!!! Very clean place and relaxing!  The handsome guys served us and share the ice cream favor to us.  COOL PLACE! COOL SERVER! We will be back for sure!

Reviews.Author: Kendall
Reviews.Content: I've had this place bookmarked for a good solid month so when a friend of mine suggested an ice cream adventure I knew we had to try this place out!  We work really long/late shifts so I love that this place is open late! (Until 10PM)  We got there around 8:30PM and when we walked in we were instantly greeted by the most lovely lady! She asked us if we had ever been and we told her it was our first time. She took her time to give us a truly great experience.  She started out by giving us a sample of the base Gelato flavor then after asking us some question gave us some suggestions and samples based on what she thought we might like. Then afterward she invited us to sample as many flavors as we wanted to make sure we got the flavor we loved the best.   I ended up going with Bananas Foster.  To. Die. For.  The flavor was incredibly authentic, not that processed, artificial banana flavor.  It was creamy, refreshing, and absolutely delicious.  The flavors change daily so i would recommend following them on Instagram to see the daily flavors!

Reviews.Author: Sharlene
Reviews.Content: Been here multiple time now and I don't know why it took me so long to write a review. There's nothing bad I can say about this place! I've been following the owner since she was at art of flavors and the gelato no matter what flavor is amazing. The service is always superb and the rotating variety of flavors they have is awesome. They always offer sample spoons and try to really find a flavor you'll enjoy and I never feel rushed to choose.   So far my favorite flavors would have to be the baklava and the halo halo. I also tried the fat Elvis sundae and it was awesome even with the candied bacon and the jam tasted freshly made. I always follow on Instagram to see what the flavor offerings are for the day and I even call to see if they have a specific flavor I want!

Reviews.Author: Mei Loh-Becker
Reviews.Content: So I was on my way to Serenade Cafe and saw this new place Gelatology opened 3mos ago (so she said)...even their bright orange sign look delicious! The gelato barista (?) eagerly offered tasting and patiently explained everything from gelato to their baked goods ..all made in house and fresh.  I like their well thought out variety ..they covered all bases from gluten free to lactose free .. I tried Ube gelato and Ube marshmallows ..love how flavorful they are...but got the orange marshmallows instead ..coz of its unique fresh citrusy profile. I love anything coconut so also bough the macarons ..they are soft and moist ! Yumm!!!  I tasted these gelatos ..Gorgonzola Pear, Lychee, Ube, Salted Caramel, Gluten Free Apple Pie Creme Brûlée ..all great ..the cheese one not something I'll die for but walked away with Lychee gelato ..refreshing, just enough sweetness for a late night dessert .. So now I'm all done with my gelato and half the bag of macaroons and few pieces of marshmallows..I feel fulfilled but still craving coffee ..good thing I haven't left the parking lot ...Serenade here come !

Reviews.Author: Blanca
Reviews.Content: Fun, upbeat atmosphere. Great service. They offer free samples of every flavor... The gelato tastes fresh and pure. We were not dissapointed on our first visit and we will be back!

Reviews.Author: Toochi
Reviews.Content: Best gelato made by a pastry chef . She always makes unique flavors and she is always at the shop and is very nice .

Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I'm going to have to try this place again on an empty stomach. My boyfriend and I had just finished a delicious and filling meal at Island Flavor when we decided to go to Serenade for tea. Both of us knew that Gelatology had opened recently, and we made the fateful decision to take a gander at the new shop. We tried so hard to keep a distance from the dazzling displays of baked goods and gelato. We really did. But then, the woman behind the display coaxed us not to be shy and reeled us in with free samples. Before we could even protest, she teased us with a sample each ... followed by 3 more samples each! By then, we had no choice but to cave to the sweet woman and order a single scoop of gelato. We usually go all out and get 3-4 scoops in a go. But we truly were still so full from the amazingness that is Island Flavor, so we settled on 1 lonely scoop of oatmeal cranberry walnut or something to similar effect. The ice cream was definitely very tasty. I'm guessing I'd like it more if I wasn't as full. Flavorwise, I think my favorite ice cream in Vegas is still 346 Patisserie, but 1) I plan on trying more gelato at Gelatology, and 2) I also intend to get the baked goods at some point.   Extra points for the wonderfully friendly and inviting service.

Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This place is AWESOME!   All their flavors taste exactly as they should.  From halo halo to cookies and cream to buko!   All are spot on!   And staff is very courteous and friendly.  Always willing to let customers sample before purchasing.  Every item we have purchased has been delicious! Just had the salted caramel gelato shake and it was amazing.  Not too sweet.  Great flavor.  The owner stops and talks with customers and is very friendly and wants to ensure a good experience here.  Very unique and refreshing awesome customer service.

Reviews.Author: Ania
Reviews.Content: Desyree is back!  She was the heart & soul of Art of Flavors & they made the biggest mistake ever as they will most likely go out of business without this lady!   When I saw my fellow yelpers talking about her opening up her own place I couldn't wait to see her & once again having her magical gelato! Bold flavors that are creamy & so addictive! On my first visit I had to go with some of my favorites like extra virgin olive oil and pear & Gorgonzola. I missed these gelato's so much! Having them again brought back all the old great memories of bringing my friends over so they could try Desyree's unique flavors! Every single person becoming a fan!   I'm thrilled she's back in business & I can't wait to try some of my other favorites like sweet cream & spicy chocolate!

Reviews.Author: Ashlie
Reviews.Content: My daughter got vanilla, that's her go to, and mine is 1/2 key lime apple pie, and 1/2 soursop. It's all delicious. I hope this place is here for years to come! The customer service is impeccable, the selection great (and delicious), homemade treats abound and the cleanliness is unmatched. I'm so impressed by this place! It's even decorated cutely. I will be back with the whole family.

Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Short and sweet: this place is amazing. The gelato is phenomenal and the people are extremely friendly. My favorite part is how passionate they are about the gelato they serve. My wife and I love coming here! Oh, and they had a vegan rice pudding gelato that blew us away. It was great! I recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Author: Lissa
Reviews.Content: This place is so good!  Different flavors everyday!  You can sample all the flavors! Love how friendly the owner is!  Yummmy!

Reviews.Author: Stefany
Reviews.Content: The Gelato Goddess is back in business! Desyree was the heart and soul of Art of Flavors, and now has her own shop, complete with the much-missed gelato, and new fun stuff like baked goods and liquid gelato. She still rocks some of the classic flavors like green tea kit kat and pear & gorgonzola, but also features daily specials and experimental new flavors.  If you want something different, the Fat Elvis sundae (peanut butter gelato, strawberry, banana compote, bacon candy, and peanuts) is a treat, but I'm a traditionalist- samples until I find what speaks to me, then a small cup all to myself!  I'm thrilled for Desyree and her new shop- the service is sweeter than ever and our favorite frozen treats are back! This isn't just a must-visit place, this is where you must be a regular.

Reviews.Author: Sum
Reviews.Content: Yummy...amazing service...amazing flavors! Everyone there is so friendly. You can tell that the owner makes sure she explains how important customer service is. All of their flavors are so yummy and amazing too. Its right near my house so its so convenient too. My daughter absolutely loves it here. I will definitely be recommending this place to my friends/family and I will definitely be back for more yummy gelato!!

Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Hands down best gelato in Las Vegas. Had an amazing tour of all the gelato flavors with Anthony and got the meet the gelato chef, Desiree. Can't wait to try all the flavors!

Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Initially, I came into this store because my friends were raging about how good it was and honestly...it really was!   As we walked in, we were greeted by the owner and workers! They were so welcoming by asking how our day was and if it was our first time there. We said  yes it's our first time  and they started pulling out samples of every flavor! The guy explained that they change flavors every day and that they keep making new flavors. So basically, it's a like a new surprise of flavors every time you visit!   Out of all the samples, I finally picked the flavor Soursop. It's a fruit the grows in tropical places and growing up in Hawaii....i used to eat this all the time! This flavor brought back so many memories and it was so good.   What I also like about this place is that they have an Instagram and Facebook account. They post what flavors will be featured that day, so you won't be going into the store blind. You'll at least get a hint of what flavors would be there that day.   I love this place and I will continue to come here for gelato!

Reviews.Author: Ave
Reviews.Content: Desyree has an excellent customer service.  The ice cream was really good but a little pricey I got the Thai tea and the s'mores one

Reviews.Author: Brenli
Reviews.Content: The gelato is delicious and different. It is a family owned business which I think is cute. The service was amazing and I highly recommend going here for a sweet treat.

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Green apple sorbet is my all time favorite! They have a lot of different flavors of gelato and sorbet. Too bad their smoothies are not made with they homemade sorbet, that is kind of disappointed. Great place for sweet treat craving.

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: How can I not give them 5 stars. Upon arrival I was greeted right away. They could tell I was a newbie in the place, and a nice gentleman handed me, and my nephews tasting spoons. If you're interested in a flavor, you're able to sample. I had to go here for the infamous green tea Kit Kat flavor and it did not disappoint. You can clearly taste the flavors, even on a small sample spoon. I just want to come back every day to try a new flavor lol.

Reviews.Author: Lorri
Reviews.Content: Yum!!!! This place is great! Amazing and unique flavors! The owners were extremely pleasant and allowed sampling. Engaged us in the theory behind the flavors and gave great suggestions on what to pick! It's very quaint and clean! So glad they are in our neighborhood! Support local business!!!

Reviews.Author: Kyung
Reviews.Content: Sweet cream is like milk ice cream that i loved growing up in korea. It's amazing how flavors match the name. If you see whatever on the name that's the flavor you'll get... like musubi, cheese, pumpkin, Thai tea.... check it out!

Reviews.Author: Joanna
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed coming here, love the flavor that my niece orders I can't have dairy so I really can't order much here but from before I ordered the purple taro gelato and it was great so I'm giving them 5 star based on service they are very friendly  and it's very convenient to the house!

Reviews.Author: Sawaros
Reviews.Content: Best gelato I had ever tried across the entire Las Vegas town!   They have variety of flavors change everyday, if you want to know if they have your favorite or not, please follow them on INSTAGRAM! They posted it everyday.   The flavors of gelato is fresh and tasty, not artical flavors and sugars. NO SWEET AT ALL.   The two owners are lovely and helpful! They give me the best service every time I go there! Totally love it!   Wish this place is away from my house only 10 minutes away not 10 miles :(

Reviews.Author: Brianna
Reviews.Content: Desyree was extremely friendly from the moment we walked through the door. She went through all of her special flavors for the day and some specialty savory flavors. The gelato is absolutely delicious! I personally love the pear and Gorgonzola! The coffee is freshly made to order and she even makes her own soda! It's amazing. Her store is family owned and run and she even informed me to keep up with her on Instagram to see the new flavors she makes EVERY DAY! How insane is that?! I highly suggest this gelato shop!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: From Illinois and Gelatogy has the BEST Gelato.  I will DEFINITELY will  come  back to this place every time I'm in town.

Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: They have very interesting flavors, but their gelato itself does not have the true creaminess of gelato.  I brought home a couple of flavors & 2 weeks later, they are still in the freezer - a true sign that it didn't meet my expectations.  If I think of it as a nice ice cream shop, it will fit the bill.

Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: Best gelato in Vegas and I like the new location a lot better than the sketchy area of Art of Flavors! Gelato messina was my sub in after Art of Flavors closed, but Gelatology definitely has a much creamier in texture.  The variety of flavors is more limited but I think more creative than Gelato Messina.  We tried the halo halo and green tea kit kat gelato and both were amazing!  I can't wait for my next trip out here!  I noticed they also have additional desserts available now, like cookies and macarons, etc.

Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: I know great gelato and this is the best in Vegas. With a smooth creamy and soft taste. The bananas foster is my personal favorite followed by chocolate. If you are going to Gelatology please be hungry as this fills you up very fast. I always go with a large. Pricing is a little more than I would spend for a pint at Wal-mart but worth every penny.

Reviews.Author: Koren
Reviews.Content: I'm so excited that this has opened here in spring valley.  My husband and I went in here to check it out last week. The owner and her father were working behind the counter.  She was so enthusiastic about here desserts and explained all the flavors to us. Everything looked amazing.  I got the creme Brulee Gelato and I my husband got the cinamon rolls gelato. Both were delicious. We sampled a few flavors before choosing and honestly,  it was all good. We will be back often. I started following them on Instagram so that I can see their daily post of with their flavors of the day are. It's a must try.

Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: What a nice treat!! :)  We enjoyed the coffee, salted caramel, and chocolate gelatos with a latte to go with it.  You can't find a better place for gourmet homemade gelatos/sorbets/pastries!  We'll be back again soon!

Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This place is awesome, unique flavored gelato, you can taste the freshness, full flavored gelato. I love the ube flavor, yes ube flavor and Nutella. Over 10 flavors served fresh. I'll be coming in with my wife and 2 boys again. Bring your family and friends here, great place to chill on a hot day. You won't regret it. And the portions is very generous, I mean packed to  the top. Great staff, very clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Author: Jidel
Reviews.Content: This was our first time here and I would say we will be back. When we walked in we were greeted right away and asked us if it was our first time. Gave us samples to try before we ordered. My husband ordered the pistachio and I ordered the strawberry Kit Kat. They also bake their own cookies, which we will try next time.

Reviews.Author: Eunice
Reviews.Content: Heaven!! Needless to say, it was deli! Had cinnamon toast and sticky toffee. Couldn't decide what flavor to get, they were all good when the guy gave us some to taste.  Very friendly staff/owners.  Better than ice cream

Reviews.Author: Ranae
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, creative (and well executed) flavors. I a big art of flavors fan when Chef Des was there, and have been waiting patiently for Gelatology to open. We've been made two trips so far and it's just as good as we remembered, plus no one is trying to sell me crack in the parking lot, unlike AoF.   Today I got half Nutella rocky road, and half donut, my husband got foie gras and rocky road. I'm looking forward to her fall flavors...the vegan pumpkin last year was insanely good.   Chef Des makes you feel like an old friend each time you come in. Her passion comes through in her product.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have no excuse. Gelatology is literally less than a mile from where I am typing this at in my den. I have been procrastinating on checking this place out forever!  Wow! What a gem of a place!  Came in tonight and we were warmly greeted at the door immediately! The young lady behind the counter (sorry, didn't get her name) was so friendly and helpful after we indicated to her that it was our first visit. She let us sample the base gelato and then let us sample as many flavors as we wanted! So many classic and unique flavors to choose from!   We each decided to grab a 6 oz ($5.50 each) cup with 2 flavors in each. I opted for cookies and cream and a strawberry/orange sorbet. My friend decided on nutella rocky road and apples and cream.   So much flavor. So much creaminess. So frickin' good!  This place will see a LOT of repeat visits on my part! Great service, great flavors (that change constantly, from what I understand), and all at a fair price! I love it!  5 stars.  Woo hoo! As good as it gets!

Reviews.Author: Tommy
Reviews.Content: I love that this place on my side of town I live down the street from this place a 5 minute drive instead of downtown vegas where the owner here came from. I've tried a few flavors here but my fave so far has to be the Pandan kit Kat. I love that the menu changes on the daily and there's a page we can go to check it out. I also tried some Pandan marshmallows and Nutella biscuits. Those were Fire!!! My wife and I were literally fighting over those biscuits. I'll be back to try some more of the goodies here

Reviews.Author: Nadine
Reviews.Content: Holy ice cream where do I start?  We were greeted with a warm welcome and were followed by multiple guests. The gentleman serving the ice cream gave everyone a taste of all the favors. It made it very easy for us to order. We even tried bell pepper ice cream. It's one of the most exotic things I've tasted.  We ended up getting cinnamon roll flavored ice cream and peanut butter- butter finger. Delicious. They have new flavore each day.  We really enjoyed this experience. The place is super clean and the staff is super friendly. We will be back :)

Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: If you are craving Gelato this is the place to go! The best gelato in town. They have plenty of options and I love that they get very creative with the flavors. One of my favorites is dulce de leche and their pear and gouda  (not sure if that's the correct cheese name) love this place!!

Reviews.Author: Idan
Reviews.Content: So good hands down best ice cream! I got the Ube kit Kat ice cream and it was so good!  They pack so much into your ice cream cup too it's amazing! I love this place and I will for sure start to be a regular whenever I have ice cream cravings.

Reviews.Author: Fox
Reviews.Content: My siblings and I use to trek all the way to the strip, just to get some gelato.  Not anymore!  This place is just around the corner from my dad's house.  Met Desyree who is friendly.  Had a few samples which were all tasty.  In the end, I had the nutella cake w/chocolate and almonds.  Super good.  It's my 1st time coming in here, and it won't be my last.

Reviews.Author: Mawa
Reviews.Content: Dropped by here to make an order prior to a friends-giving event the following day. From start to finish it was seamless, I was open to suggestions on customizing my gift basket and they gave an array of options to choose from to substitute items from the base basket. I especially liked how you can choose Nutella or fruit for the panettone filling! I chose fruit since it seemed the more traditional choice for the holidays. I wasn't super picky with everything else though, but I did sub an item that was missing to their holiday cookies that looked too cute to eat.  In addition to the basket, I also ordered a gelato pie since they had that advertised on their instagram. After taste tasting for a few minutes, I decided to go with the rosemary with olive oil mixed with creme brûlée gelato flavor. Reason being that I was told before that their rosemary with olive oil was amazing, and that I personally love all things creme brûlée flavored.    The following day I arrived about 20 minutes late from the allotted time I gave them, but they weren't miffed by it at all. The packaging of both the gift basket and the gelato pie were perfectly handled and wrapped with care, no dents or mushiness. During my revisit though I tried their gingerbread and green tea kitkat gelato and loved the smooth, creamy texture as well as the hint of wafers from the green tea kit kat.   Needless to say the end result was satisfying, and most of the guests/hosts at the friends-giving event were delighted to try the gelato pie! It had the right amount of sweetness (no diabeetus!) with small tidbits of rosemary and you can taste the first feels of crunchiness when biting onto an actual creme brûlée after lit with fire. The gift basket was a bit much it seemed but they appreciated it nonetheless. It was my first time actually attending a friends-giving-anything so I took the time with slightly subtle first impressions via food haha.   Overall, I love Gelatology. Their flavors are always innovative and delectable and if given the time I would come by more than once a week! The owners are also always very friendly and patiently let you try out as many flavors as you would like- especially on busy days. Even during hot summer days they package your gelato to-go with great care!  Take note: they have a stamp card for customers via the Epoxy app! Get enough stamps and you get a large sized gelato for free!!

Reviews.Author: Daniel Dong-Kyu
Reviews.Content: Whoever the masterbaker or chef is of this place must have a PhD in Gelatology and Chemistry, because they have synthesized the purest looking and tasting Gelato I've ever experienced!  I was never too fond of gelato (prefer the fluffiness and colder temperature of ice cream), but Gelatology has made me a fan today! They make all their gelatos in house and also have new flavors every day!  Tried their black sesame kit kat gelato along with ricotta cheesecake and lemon green tea. The thick, rich, and creamy consistency along with the perfect balance of the black sesame and kit kat flavors put me in a state of euphoria. Just wow. It was soooooo good! The Ricotta cheesecake was also very aromatic, and the lemon green tea was really tasty and refreshing.   I will definitely be back, and I hope you guys still have the black sesame kit kat!

Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: Lots of variety to choose from.  You will not be disappointed!  I had the avocado, halo-halo, and pear & gorgonzola! Yum!

Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Seriously?!!!! Amazing-ness! I am not a huge ice cream/ gelato fan as it takes me a few days to finish a small one. However, I've been following Gelatology on IG and I've been dying to try a lot of the flavors. I showed my husband the picture of the Thai tea gelato and I told him that I needed this. He told me that there was a chai latte flavor too. He made the trek to get me the two flavors and it was well worth the $6!   I loved that it wasn't crazy sweet and it tasted like thai tea and chai latte. The chai latte is on the  spicier  side which is how I like my chai anyways.
